name: popsimwrapper-dev
postCreateCommand: bash -lc 'sudo apt update && sudo apt install -y osmium-tool && cd /workspace && (test -f pyproject.toml && uv sync || true) && uv run python -m ipykernel install --user --name popsimwrapper --display-name "popsimwrapper (devcontainer)"'
initializeCommand: docker network inspect popsimwrapper_network >NUL 2>&1 || docker network create popsimwrapper_network >NUL 2>&1
